divs: sighting detailsi saw this object under a bank of clouds northeast of blissfield\towards monroe, mi no other stars or objects around it. i was curious because i it was so bright and under the low clouds. i watched the light as i drove home to toledo and as i travelled through ottawa lake, i noticed the light was closer to toledo than monroe. as i turned onto sterns rode i watched and the object seemed to gradually travel to toledo. i watched it until i returned home and the last i saw it, it was east of toledo near lake erie.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Blissfield
There were no other sightings in Blissfield on or around September 3rd 2010
Summary: Bright white light rotating with a red light.
